name: Henry's Prison Fight
description:
Instructions:

Click on the alerts to defend yourself!

Don't click too late! If you're too late to click, you're gonna get hit or tased!

Credits:

Henry Stickmin & some sounds made and belongs too: PuffballsUnited

Menu music by Kevin MacLoed: Sneaky Snitch

Win menu music by iMovie: Buddy

Note:

This game is short, not a big hype game. Just made for fun :)
